nodes.bodyText: refactored isLoaded function for RW-6005 workaround.
Fix signInAs function to remove unused page parameter

nit: I don't think O needs to be uppercased.
Also, I would add the time unit suffix so it's clear if this is milliseconds, seconds, nanoseconds, etc.
parameter timeout is in a lot of functions. to keep it consistent, I'll make a separate PR to append the suffix.
nit: Reload*ing* seems a little more accurate since it's going to execute the action itself (and it's not asking the user to do so).
does this need to be changed to let?
it is initiated twice. at line 55.
should we just create/find a workspace in a beforeAll function? I'm not sure if its always the case that tests will run in sequence, especially if we add parallelization.
In Jest, tests in same file will always run. in serial order.
